survey.intro_random: The following 15 random questions will help assess your workplace culture.
survey.intro_enough: After enough questions have been answered, scores will be displayed, with explanations.
survey.intro_purpose: This will allow you to understand what can be done to improve aspects of your workplace culture that have scores.
survey.intro_anonymous: This survey is anonymous. No-one can know who answers, not even the developers of this application.
survey.intro_team: Note: in the following questions, where a "team" is mentioned, think of the people you interact with the most to perform your tasks.
survey.intro_NA: If a question does not apply, simply click Next.
survey.intro_identifier: If you have a respondent identifier please enter here before continuing:
survey.respondent_here: Here's your respondent identifier. This identifier allows you to keep track of changes over time. The graph with your scores will show the history of the scores.
survey.respondent_once: This identifier is only displayed once, and now. Write it down or copy it and paste it in a secure note. It must remain confidential and not be shared with anyone else.
survey.respondent_answered: You have answered no questions. | You have answered 1 question. | You have answered {count} questions.
